summary: REQ-23 (logo swap) does not appear to be implemented. The only modified files in the diff are metadata/summary files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json), and there is no evidence that the logo asset, header/footer logo usage, or Open Graph image reference were updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the siteâ€™s current Meraki logo with the user-uploaded file `logo.png` and ensure the new logo is used everywhere the current logo image is referenced (header, footer, and Open Graph metadata image).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no change to the required static asset path, no edits to HeaderNav/Footer to use the new logo, and no confirmation that `frontend/index.html` OG image tag still points to `/assets/generated/meraki-logo.dim_1024x1024.png` while rendering the new logo. Only summary/state files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale branding/marketing site redesign work (deep purple/gold branding, new fonts, Tailwind token updates, many landing page sections, admin pages, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are described in the modified summary/state files but were not requested; the BuildRequest explicitly scoped the change to swapping the logo asset and references, and listed non-goals like changing brand colors/typography/layout/copy and adding new pages/admin functionality.
